akn:section.akn:heading: Legal assistance for police in wrongful arrest cases.

akn:content.akn:p: In accordance with regulations prescribed by the Council of the District of Columbia, the Corporation Counsel of the District of Columbia shall represent any officer or member of the Metropolitan Police Department, if he so requests, in any civil action for damages resulting from an alleged wrongful arrest by such officer or member.

If the Corporation Counsel fails or is unable to represent such officer or member when requested to do so, the Mayor of the District of Columbia shall compensate such officer or member for reasonable attorneyâ€™s fees (as determined by the court) incurred by him in his defense of the action against him.
